500460.name: SpaceEngine - Uranus System HD
500460.description:
This Uranus System HD DLC (addon) contains high-resolution textures for Uranus and its major satellites - Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Titania, and Oberon. It DOES NOT improves the level of detail of these objects compared to the default SpaceEngine installation, but replaces their default low-quality JPEG textures with high-quality PNG ones.

Credits:
Uranus texture (artwork): "Snowfall"
Satellite textures and elevation maps (artwork): "Snowfall" - "Uranus Project Missing Data"
Satellite elevation maps were resampled to 16-bit by Vladimir Romanyuk "SpaceEngineer"
